explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks via lazy initialization, ensured dependent UI components are obtained through existing getters, guarded scrollbar access, and set border/preferred size only once on the cached panel.
resolve_compilation_errors: Implemented the missing getFontFamilyPanel method using existing fields (fontNamePanel) and constants (TOP_PANE_PREFERRED_HEIGHT); relied on already-imported Swing/AWT classes.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Replaced constructor-driven assembly with a lazily initialized panel that caches and returns a single instance, uses BorderLayout, places an accessible "Font Name" label at the top, embeds the font family list in a JScrollPane with always-visible vertical scrollbar and non-focusable scrollbar, and uses a subpanel to place the text field above the list.
refactoring: Centralized font family UI construction into getFontFamilyPanel, reused existing getters for the text field and list, and clarified local variable naming for readability.
misc: Added brief inline comments and ensured formatting aligns with existing panel-building methods; no new custom API calls were introduced (none).
